articles.description: China plans to send a flying robot to the far side of the moon next year to search for the frozen water that could hold the key to future lunar exploration, as the country pushes forward with its ambitious space program.
articles.content: China plans to send a flying robot to the far side of the moon next year to search for the frozen water that could hold the key to future lunar exploration, as the country pushes forward with its amb… [+3416 chars]

articles.title: New StarCam Now Livestreaming Atop Maunakea - Big Island Video News
articles.description: MAUNAKEA, Hawaiʻi - The Canada-France-Hawaii Telescope has partnered with Japanese media company Asahi Shimbun to provide a 24/7 livestream of Maunakea’s summit.
articles.content:
StarCam images courtesy CFHT & Asahi Shimbun in collaboration with Subaru Telescope, NAOJ

articles.author: Jack Tamisiea
articles.title: Bonobos Can Tell When a Human Doesn’t Know Something - Scientific American
articles.description: An experiment shows that bonobos can understand when a human lacks knowledge and point them in the right direction
articles.content: A few captive bonobos recently faced a seemingly simple task: locate a tasty snack hidden under one of three cups. Because bonobos are brainiacs, pinpointing the cup with the treat should have been n… [+4822 chars]
